Devops in own lang.
DevOps ka matlab Development aur Operations ko ek saath laana hota hai taaki software fast aur smooth tarike se deliver ho sake. Pehle developers sirf code likhte the aur operations team deploy karti thi, jisse delays aur errors aate the. DevOps is gap ko kam karta hai aur automation par focus karta hai. Is process mein software pehle plan hota hai, phir code likha jaata hai, uske baad build aur testing automatically hoti hai. Testing ke baad application server par deploy ho jaati hai aur continuously monitor ki jaati hai taaki performance achi rahe. DevOps ka main aim manual kaam kam karna aur software delivery ko reliable banana hota hai. Isme GitHub, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes aur cloud platforms jaise AWS ya Azure use hote hain. CI/CD DevOps ka important part hai jisme code automatically test hota hai aur bina delay ke live ho jaata hai. Simple words mein, DevOps software banane se lekar usse users tak pahunchane ka fast aur automatic process hai.



Git and Git hub in own lang.
GitHub ek online platform hai jahan developers apna code store aur manage karte hain. Ye ek tarah ka online backup hota hai jahan project ka poora code safe rehta hai. GitHub ka main use team ke saath milkar kaam karna aur code ke changes ko track karna hota hai. Isme Git use hota hai jo ek version control system hai. Git batata hai ki code mein kab, kya aur kisne change kiya. Agar kabhi code kharab ho jaaye, toh GitHub se purana version easily wapas laa sakte hain. GitHub par project ek repository ke andar hota hai, jisme code files, documents aur ek README file hoti hai jo project ke baare mein basic information deti hai. Jab developer code mein changes karta hai aur save karta hai, usse commit kehte hain. Local system se code GitHub par bhejna push kehlata hai aur GitHub se latest code lena pull kehlata hai. New features par kaam karne ke liye branch ka use hota hai, jisse original code safe rehta hai aur baad mein changes merge kar diye jaate hain.
